content.text: What is your favorite song by Nirvana?
I enjoy listening to Nirvana in my spare time as well. My favorite song by them is smells like teen spirit.
I have always enjoyed their music, but never really got into the lyrics. What do you think they are about?
I think they are about the struggles of youth and the feeling of not belonging.
I agree. I think that is why they have such a wide appeal to people of all ages.
I also like their music because it is not afraid to be dark and sad.
I think that is what makes them so relatable.
I used to be a teacher, but I had to quit due to my health.
I am sorry to hear that. What was your favorite thing about being a teacher?
I loved working with kids and helping them learn.
That must have been very rewarding.
It was. I miss it a lot.
I am sure you will find something else that you love to do.
